alert.note: Alert for Jones; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 5:41PM CDT until May 07 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jones County in west central Texas... Northwestern Taylor County in west central Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 540 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tye, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hawley around 605 PM CDT. Anson and Nugent around 615 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Funston, Impact, Hodges, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Stith, Truby and The Intersection Of Us-180 And Farm Road 600. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 267 and 285. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
